quote_last: that afternoon, the two majors presented themselves to General Austin's temporary secretary at his away-from-Pentagon office.
quote_raw: Promptly at two minutes to two that afternoon, the two majors presented themselves to General Austin's temporary secretary at his away-from-Pentagon office.
title: Steel Tiger
author: Mark Berent

quote_last: , but nothing moved, Stari Teočak was silent and so empty it seemed abandoned, and yet Tijmen constantly felt he was being observed by invisible eyes.
quote_raw: It was almost two o’clock, but nothing moved, Stari Teočak was silent and so empty it seemed abandoned, and yet Tijmen constantly felt he was being observed by invisible eyes.
title: King of Tuzla
author: Arnold Jansen op de Haar
